Our specialized and trained relationship officers work tirelessly to find your dream property and negotiate the deal to arrive at the best possible value.
We are Executive Member of National Association of Realtors and Calicut Realtors Association – India with tie up of 43 associations across India and UAE.
We Provide the following Specialised Features :
* Hassle free Documentation
* Maintenance care –fixing of Electrical, Plumbing and Carpentry faults before handing over of the property

column2: 12.5 cent Land with building for Sale in Kozhikode Corp.
column4: ['Home', 'Properties', 'For Rent: Houses & Apartments', 'For Rent: Houses & Apartments in Kerala', 'For Rent: Houses & Apartments in Kozhikode', 'For Rent: Houses & Apartments in Chevayur', '12.5 cent Land with building for Sale in Kozhikode Corp.']
column7:
Four units of 3 BHK residential apartments  in one building  consisting of 12.5 cent land for sale in Kozhikode corporation area approx  6 km from Kozhikode city. Each apartment has 3 Bed rooms, 2 Toilets, Hall, Sit out, Kitchen and Work area and two entrance in the front side  (Two flats in each floor of a 2 storied building).  Plinth area of  4 unit is 3602 sq ft  and 361 sq ft of  stair case (Total plinth area=3963 sq ft).  
There is enough space for parking and kids playing.   The building has approx. 25 meter approach road from main road (Beypore –Kozhikode main road which is going to upgrade as Beypore port to Kozhikode NH). Since the property is in  the heart of the town and Kozhikode city is just 6 km (10 minute drive) away from Arakinar town,  the building  has high  potential to have a regular monthly income for those who are seeking an investment plan. The property can be utilized to run various business portfolios such as  training /education / tuition centre or as boys hostel or girls hostel or as working women’s hostel or  as residential apartments after suitable modification and renovation. WELL water and corporation water is available in the property. The asking price is 14 Lakhs/cent – (Negotiable)
Serious buyers are kindly requested to respond to this Ad at the earliest.

column2: FOR LEASE / PANAYAM AT MANKAVU, CALICUT
column4: ['Home', 'Properties', 'For Rent: Houses & Apartments', 'For Rent: Houses & Apartments in Kerala', 'For Rent: Houses & Apartments in Kozhikode', 'For Rent: Houses & Apartments in Mankavu', 'FOR LEASE / PANAYAM AT MANKAVU, CALICUT']
column7:
Two Stored Independent House with All Facilities in 10 Cents of Land Road Side in Mankavu, 1.5 Km Away From Lulu Mall At Calicut for Lease/ Panayam
	Area: 2500 Sq. Feet
	Bedrooms: Four
	Bathrooms: Four
	Total Floors: Two
	Floor: Ground Floor and First Floor
	Facing: East
	Furnished: Furnished 
	Possession: Within 15 Days
Description:
The house consists of sit out, Big hall, Dining Room, 2 bedrooms with one bedroom attached and other one with common Bathroom, Puja room, Kitchen, work area, Toilet and Bathroom in work area also and covered car parking in the ground floor and in the first floor common area, 2 bedrooms with common Bathroom, Balcony covered open terrace with sheet and separate Toilet in Terrace. The house was constructed Measuring 2500 sq. in plinth area with good compound wall. The property is situated about 600 meters away from Valiya Mankavu and about 100 meters away from Mankavu- Kacherikkunnu road and on the way to Thalikunnu Shiva Temple Road. The area is thickly populated and this is a convenient residential area with all residential facilities. The House has KWA water connection and also independent well.3 phase electrical connection. The property has direct road access and vehicles can enter in the property directly from Road

പാണ്ടിക്കാട് നിന്ന് ആറു മിനിറ്റ് ദൂരം
മഞ്ചേരിയിൽ നിന്നും മലപ്പുറത്തുനിന്നും ബസ്/കാറിൽ 20 മിനിറ്റ് ദൂരം.
സൗകര്യങ്ങൾ
രണ്ട് ബെഡ്റൂം, ഒരു ഹാൾ, ഒരു അടുക്കള, ഒരു ബാത്ത്റൂം.

Premium, Classy and Exclusive 2BHK flats for rent at Ottappalam 
New & Spacious premium 2BHK Flats at MENONS ROYALE at AISHWARYA GARDEN/ANAND NAGAR, East MANISSERI, Opposite ASIAN WOOD PALACE or ROYAL CATERING. Amenities include Wardrobes, Kitchen Cabinets, Fans, Lighting, Two A/Cs, Inverter, Water Purifier, Water Heaters, Underground Water Tank, Kitchen Waste Digester (Trust Bin), Incinerator for Paper, Sanitary and Bins for Other Waste Disposal, Automated Lighting as well as Water Distribution etc. Close to 7th Day & Valluvanad, Ashwini and PK DAs Hospital as well as Schools like Amrita, Carmel and Bhavans School. Just 25 meters from Palakkad-Shoranur Highway.
Only two exclusive 2BHK flats and one 1BHK flat in the entire building (one in each floor) both with Two Covered Car Parking facility apart from ample Visitors Car and Two Wheeler Parking. Available from the 01 April 2024.

column7:
FULLY FURNISHED NEWLY PAINTED APARTMENTS- AC 2 BHK (2 BDS)-READY TO OCCUPY,-having 820 Sqft & 750 Sqft Super built up Area, for LONG TERM period of 11 Months  —AND FULLY FURNISHED 1BHK AC-ONE BED ROOM having 412 Sqft Super built up Area ,for LONG TERM period of  11 Months RENTAL -For FAMILY Accommodation Only, LOCATED in Padamughal , Indira Junction,Satellite Township (NRI Housing Scheme),near Kakkanad, named as *CHAMMANY ENCLAVE.
 2 BHK AC LONG TERM- TWO  Bedrooms Air-Conditioned Fully Furnished Apartment for LONG TERM period of 11 Months, the Monthly Rent is Rs 22,000/- & Security Deposit is Rs 66,000/- .
         1 BHK AC LONG TERM-,Fully Furnished Apartment for LONG TERM for a period of 11 months, the Monthly Rent is Rs 18,000/- & Security deposit is Rs 55,000/-
———————————————
     SHORT TERM for Six Months till 10 Months for 2 BHK AC Fully Furnished, the Monthly Rent is Rs 26,000/-.
        1 BHK AC SHORT TERM -SHORT TERM of 6 Months till TEN Months-Monthly Rent for fully furnished for (ONE BHK) AC Single Bed Apartment is Rs 22000/- & Security deposit Rs 66,000/- . 
       
& NO EXTRA COMMON MAINTENANCE CHARGES.
————————————
         *FACILITIES*
1) Drawing cum Dinning 
2) Kitchen 
3) AC Double Bed Room bath attached 
4) CCTV in all 3 Floors 
5) Covered 5 Car parking & Bike Parking 
6) Foot Ground in front of this Building
7) Independent Waste Bin Chamber for each tenants Food Waste & Plastic Waste Disposal 
8) Tress work in Terrace for hanging clothes 
9) Common Area Cleaning expenses & Common lighting electricity charges will be met by the Owner. 
10) Rain water harvesting 
11) No pollution even though located near by Cochin City 
12) No Water locked issues during Rainy Season
—————————————
For Short Term we provided Kitchen Utensils including Pressure Cooker & Mixy 
         *LOCATION-*
100 Metres-More Super Market behind this building 
4 Km to Ekm Bye Pass near Holiday Inn Hotel & Palarivattom Bye pass
2 Km to Collectorate Traffic Signal 
2.5 Km to Info park 
1/2 Km from Padamughal Junction 
700 Meters to Relience Super market

5 Km Approximately to Edapally Lulu Mall 
7 Km Approximately to Forum Mall
7 Km to Amritha Hospital 
15 Km to Rajagiri Hospital 
4.1 Km to Ernakulam Medical Centre Hospital 
4.1 Km to Rajagiri Christu Jayanti School 
2.4 Km to Sunrise Hospital,in Seaport- Airport road 
3.9 Km to Palarivattom Bye Pass Road . 
———————
           *INVENTORIES*
Two Bedroom fitted with Air-Conditioners 
Fans 5 Nos 
Bed room Mirror (4Feet)
Water heater Geyser 
Airtel Dish Antenna in each Bed rooms 
RO Water Purifier 
Fridge 
Washing Machine (Automatic)
Induction Cooker 
Pipe Gas  with Gas Stove

Dinning Table with 4 Chairs , 
Setty & Tepoy & 
Queen Size Bed Coat & Bed
For Short Term Kitchen Utensils will be provided like - Pressure Cooker,Mixy,Frying Pan,Plates,Glass
————————
     Additional Expenses
1) Electricity Charges 
2) Water fixed monthly charges 
3) Pipe Gas fixed monthly charges and monthly unit charges consumed as per meter reading .
4) Waste disposal Charges for Food & Plastic Waste from the building premises by the tenants.
5) Initial Documentation charges for Stamp paper & typing & miscellaneous expenses.
————————————
       *Special Note* - 
1) Bachelor Accommodation is  not available & all Apartments are family accommodations alone. 
2) All Inventories like Airconditioner, Fridge,Washing Machine ,Invertor, Fans, R.O.Water Purifier,Gyser (Water heater) Induction Cooker  & All Furniture’s should be well  maintained during the tenancy without making any damages & without making the Owner liable for the same.
